Various Assortment of Personal Projects

most are driven by “how is there no good app for this in existence!?!”

Animal Tracking
an app to assist in tracking of fostered cats & dogs and adoptions
Lending Library
A quick and easy way to track what books are on my shelf and which have been leant to a friend.
Mindful Logging
App to quickly track how time is used and the mindful benefit.
RecipEZ
version control recipe tracker that knows your pantry and tells you what to cook
Project Tracker
New best friend of any maker.

A portfolio of some of my work.
